channel.title: My experience playing today
channel.description:
OK, so I sit down at my computer, and log onto RuneScape. For the first time in a very long time. Mainly for the very reasons I'm about to bring up. Anyways, I go to Catherby to fish, and I start fishing, and I'm doing well, then some retards start talking, like level 40's and 50's, they all are like sucking each others cock and shit about how one could own the other. So I tell them all to shut the fuck up. And they take it personal. So I start making fun of them, just as I would anywhere else. Like here. And I noticed how fucking retarded people on RuneScape were. Half of the insults I used on them, they didn't comprehend. And then, a half hour later. I decided to see if you could say Mopar, and then I tried Moparisthebest. And they both showed up. And wouldn't you fucking know, someone plays MoparScape where I said it.
And he sits there and asks me, "What server you play on?" And I tell him I don't play, it's ****ing ******, and I realized that you can't cuss. So I'm all pissed off that I can't emphasize my point, with a few cuss words. And then to top it all off, this 'girl' starts talking, 'misscutie' or some shit was her name. Just being a guy pretending to be a girl, it was totally obvious. So I said, "So misscutie, how's it feel to be a tranny." And she said, "excuse me? Not all girls on runescape are guys." and so I retorted with "Sure, you're just as much a girl as _____" (There were like 4 other guys pretending to be girls there.) And she said, "I am a girl!" And then I said an old classic. "****(Tits) or gtfo" And she obviously didn't know the term. So I said forget it you wouldn't understand.
But yeh, I hate the people who play RuneScape, and I hope somehow I can overlook that when the new graphical update takes place. Don't you just love the fucking retards who play RuneScape, and then somehow find their way to RuneScape cheating communities such as this one.

they aren’t retarded, they are just prepubescent and immature

I can back that up by saying, 4 gay asians, my 8 yr old brother and my 10 yr old cousin that i know personally play.

Nice.
[/quote]
Thankyou, come over on friday and you will fit in well.[/quote]LOLOL pwnt

item.title: My experience playing today
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:14, topic:216310”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=284298.msg2308871#msg2308871 date=1214962064]

Thats another reason I quit. Although this also happens with the 11 year olds who somehow got cod4 for ps3. They are so fucking annoying and you can’t shut them up.

That’s why you either wait for Firmware update 2.4 or get an xbox 360. So you can mute people kay?

you dont need firmware 2.4 to mute and if you get a 360 everyone is aged 9-12
[/quote]

You can only mute people who are in your lobby silly.

Also you are completely retard if you think everyone on xbox live is aged 9-12. Actually… you are just a complete retard.[/quote]
Its called an exaggeration look up in OED ffs

Frostie21:

Says the ps3 fanboy.You look at every opportunity to put the 360 down.It’s getting quite annoying.

So?

Read full topic
